com.gitblit

Class LuceneExecutor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gitblit.LuceneExecutor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable

    public class LuceneExecutor
extends Object
implements Runnable
    The Lucene executor handles indexing and searching repositories.
    Author:
    James Moger

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Run is executed by the Gitblit executor service. Because this is called by an executor service, calls will queue - i.e. there can never be concurrent execution of repository index updates.
        Specified by:
        run in interface Runnable

        public boolean deleteBlob(String repositoryName,
                 String branch,
                 String path)
                   throws Exception
        Delete a blob from the specified branch of the repository index.
        Parameters:
        repositoryName -
        branch -
        path -
        Returns:
        true, if deleted, false if no record was deleted
        Throws:

      • search

        public List<com.gitblit.models.SearchResult> search(String text,
                                           int page,
                                           int pageSize,
                                           List<String> repositories)
        Searches the specified repositories for the given text or query
        Parameters:
        text - if the text is null or empty, null is returned
        page - the page number to retrieve. page is 1-indexed.
        pageSize - the number of elements to return for this page
        repositories - a list of repositories to search. if no repositories are specified null is returned.
        Returns:
        a list of SearchResults in order from highest to the lowest score

      • search

        public List<com.gitblit.models.SearchResult> search(String text,
                                           int page,
                                           int pageSize,
                                           String... repositories)
        Searches the specified repositories for the given text or query
        Parameters:
        text - if the text is null or empty, null is returned
        page - the page number to retrieve. page is 1-indexed.
        pageSize - the number of elements to return for this page
        repositories - a list of repositories to search. if no repositories are specified null is returned.
        Returns:
        a list of SearchResults in order from highest to the lowest score
